onClick.label: right-click for more options
onClick.action: function( track, feature, div ){var top_url = (window.location != window.parent.location)? document.referrer: document.location.href; var pre_url = top_url.split('/');  var taxid = 246197; var new_url = ['https:/' , pre_url[2], 'organism', taxid, 'gene', this.feature[7]].join('/'); return window.parent.location=new_url}

menuTemplate.label: load this gene page
menuTemplate.action: function( track, feature, div ){var top_url = (window.location != window.parent.location)? document.referrer: document.location.href; var pre_url = top_url.split('/'); var taxid = 246197; var new_url = ['https:/' , pre_url[2], 'organism', taxid, 'gene', this.feature[7]].join('/'); return window.parent.location=new_url}
